alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:52PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Davidson, central Sumner and eastern Robertson Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Madison, or 8 miles north of Nashville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Madison, Hendersonville, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Ridgetop, Cross Plains, Portland, Joelton, Old Hickory, Orlinda, Mitchellville, Oak Grove, Whites Creek and Cottontown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 88 and 120. Interstate 24 between mile markers 35 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
